Cat's Eye Amulet

miscellaneous (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 287
darkvision [darkvision]: 50
stealth bonus [stealthb]: +20

Requires 5E to forge (E1)

An amulet in the shape of a cat's face set with two cat's eye stones. When properly enchanted, the stones will give the wearer darkvision and, if he is already stealthy, will also enhance that ability. This amulet is popular among thieves and murderers.
